body:
Hello Avicus Network!
I had a average livestream people decided to troll me and put me down but I got though it so this morning I streamed 3 hours instead of 4 so that stream will not be on YouTube

But feel free to stick around because tonight! Yes tonight at 7 or 8 PM AEST that's in about in 4 hours I will be streaming YET AGAIN!!! For about 2-3 hours feel free to join and watch me wreck people or die like a pleb. I will be live at twitch.tv/shadowolfyt also follow me on Twitter to see when I go LIVE on the Avicus!!!

Twitch: twitch.tv/shadowolfyt
Twitter: @shadowolfyt
YouTube: youtube.com/shadowolf365

title: Avicus Livestream AGAIN!!!

replies.body:
Tell those trolls where to go man

i have never met u or seen u b4 but now I massive fanboy of u, keep getting our name out there!
replies.body_tagged:
Tell those trolls where to go man

i have never met u or seen u b4 but now I massive fanboy of u, keep getting our name out there!

replies.body:
Thank You Man, I don't think I have met you either would be nice if we killed each other or teamed up with each other on a game or we cross paths on TeamSpeak

When we cross paths I will definitely have a conversation with you. People like you inspire me to create better content work harder and record and stream more often. I want to thank YOU! For encouraging me and inspiring me to be who I am and all of my friends on the Avicus!
